Strings.String: %1$s is not a valid share path. It should look like \\Computer\Folder or \\Computer\Shared\Folder

Access to the share %1$s is denied - check the user name and/or password
There is no share %1$s on the computer %2$s
Access to the file %1$s is denied
Access to the share %1$s is denied - you may need to specify a user name and password
Share %1$s has too many active connections
Failed to add the shared folder. The folder you wish to add is a subset of an existing shared folder.

The user name is too long

Unable to play '%1$s' - access to %2$s denied.
Unable to connect to %2$s - too many active shares.#END_OF_LOCALIZED_STRING %1$s

Unable to play '%1$s' - there are too many connections to the share %2$s.
Unable to play '%1$s' - station not found.
Unable to play '%1$s' - network connection speed insufficient to maintain playback buffer.
Unable to play '%1$s' - cannot connect to %2$s because the server cannot be found.
Audible is no longer supported on Sonos.
Unable to play '%1$s' - Windows Media Sharing is not turned on for one or more Sonos players.
Unable to play '%1$s' - a valid license could not be obtained.
Unable to play '%1$s' - the %2$s account login information is not valid.
Unable to play '%1$s' - the associated %2$s account was not found in your Sonos system.

Unable to play '%1$s' - your %2$s trial has expired.
Please upgrade your account with %2$s.

Playback from %2$s was stopped because playback was started from another room or device. %2$s limits the number of simultaneous audio streams you can access from its service.#END_OF_LOCALIZED_STRING %1$s
Unable to play '%1$s' - please upgrade your account with %2$s to become a full subscriber.
Unable to play '%1$s' - your Last.fm login information is not valid.
Unable to play song '%1$s' because '%2$s' is unavailable. Launch the Sonos controller on '%2$s' to enable playback.
Unable to play '%1$s' because you need to reauthorize %2$s.
Unable to play '%1$s' because %2$s is not available in your area.
Unable to play '%1$s' - '%2$s' automatically stops playback after long periods of inactivity.
Unable to play '%4$s' - access is denied.#END_OF_LOCALIZED_STRING %1$s%2$s%3$s

%1$s.sonos.com/%3$s
Please select from the following choices:
Last.fm is a music recommendation service that lets you share and discover new music. By effortlessly scrobbling the music you play you can get personalised recommendations tailored to your taste.

To use %1$s with Sonos, create an account by pressing the button below.
%2$s
%1$s not installed. Please install app and try again.

Sonos comes with a free, no-obligation %1$s trial.

By taking advantage of this free, no-obligation trial, you agree to the %2$s terms and conditions at:
%1$s.sonos.com/%3$s/terms

With your %1$s login information, you'll be able to use the %1$s trial on your Sonos system.
To continue listening after the trial has ended, you will need to upgrade your account with %1$s to become a subscriber.

The %1$s trial has ended on this Sonos system.
To continue listening, please upgrade your account with %1$s to become a subscriber.
Press the OK button to continue.

%1$s.sonos.com/%3$s/subscribe
%4$s

%1$s.sonos.com/%3$s/subscribe

%1$s was unable to complete your request because your account has been suspended.

There was a problem adding the trial. %1$s is not available in your location.
You have reached the maximum number of music service accounts that can be added to your Sonos system. Please remove an existing account before adding a new one.

Strings.String: This controller was unable to connect to a Sonos component. Please try again. (%1$d)
You can set the Sonos player's Line-Out level to Variable or Fixed.
When a Sonos player is set to Extender mode it will not appear in the Rooms menu. Select a mode for this Sonos player.
Choose a name for the Line-In source
You must select a Sonos player before setting alarm volume.
Volume settings are not available while a Sonos player's Line-Out level is set to Fixed.
Do you want the clock to show on THIS controller when the alarm sounds?
Do you want to save the alarm you are working on?
Are you sure you want to delete this alarm?

No more alarms may be created. Please delete an existing alarm before adding a new one.
Unable to delete the alarm. Please try again later.
Your system will set the date and time from the Internet.
Press New Alarm to set an alarm.
Select how you want compilation albums to be grouped.

Scrobbling means that when you listen to any song on Sonos, its name is added to your Last.fm music profile. This data helps Last.fm recommend music to you, create radio stations based on your musical taste, and much more.
Please select a scrobbling option:
Warning: Your wireless network will not support the use of a SUB or surrounds with your %1$s.
